posts.post_title: FS: 4 sharp HOF PSA 7's, Wheat, Joss, Clarke!
posts.post_content:
Need quick funds, Bender is an absolute bargain....Looking for deal tonight.....I also have 65-70 PSA 7's available, thanks.


Chief Bender (Portrait) Pied 150 PSA 7,razor corners....$2350, reduced to $2200..TONIGHT only.......$1850!!**SOLD**
Zack Wheat Pied 350-460) PSA 7, 50/50 centering .....$2000, reduced to $1850...
Fred Clarke (bat) Pied 150 PSA 7, 50/50 centering....GONE



Please send me your email for pics, thanks....
Have seen the Bender and Wheat - both are sharp NM examples!!
Bender only $1850! The last 7 at auction went for over $2500....
